reviews.review: Team Fortress Classic is not just one of the best FPS games out there, it's probably one of the best games of all time. I really love playing this game. Everything about it is just so perfect. Sure, the graphics are outdated and there may be some sound glitches here and there, but overall, the game is amazingly well done. I definitely recommend playing this if you haven't. It's only 5 dollars, it runs on almost any PC (because of its primitive graphics and engine), and it's a fun, addicting 90's gaming experience. And I also think it's a little better than Team Fortress 2. I also recommend that you play the game because there aren't a lot of players (last time I was on, there were less than 100 players playing on a total of 73 servers) and we NEED more players! PLEASE buy this game! I definitely recommend this game.

Veamos que tiene de ofrecer Team Fortress Classic.
Es un juego competetitivo entre el equipo red y blu los cuales tienen que cumplir misiones para que uno sobresalga, basicamente eso es todo.

-Puntos buenos-
> Competitivo decente.
> Multiplayer Divertido.
> Variedad de personajes
> No requiere de un pc con una Ram muy buena
> Graficos buenos. 
-Puntos malos-
> Variedad de armas (son repetitivas aveces)
> No hay un Jugador.

8/10

Bueno, pero si no cuentas con internet o amigos que lo tengan lo dejaras a un lado.

Решил я выяснить, почему вторая часть Team Fortress так скатилась и в какой период игра была максимально крутой. Поэтому я установил это и погнал на любимый 2Fort. И я с трудом выдержал час этого ада... Нет, не адского геймплея, а адской механики и физики... Ужасная игра во всех смыслах, которая тут же и ушла в анинсталл. Team Fortress 2 - шедевр, ребята! Настоящий шедевр! Я удивлен, как можно было в этом овнище разглядеть такую крутую идею и геймплей, который имеется во второй части, но всем, кто считает, что Team Fortress 2 скатилась: поиграйте в это дно. Просто часик, больше не надо. 
У меня всё.

Team Fortress was, and is, a tour de force. While aesthetically it does not resemble the Team Fortress we are used to today, it is the defining blueprint for multiplayer-focused first person shooters that came after it. While Doom and Quake may have perfected the chaos that is first-person shooter, Team Fortress refined and transformed this chaos into an art.
It's like TF2 but instead of hats you have grenades. Not as flashy, but more, well, flashy.

The Community for this game is absolutely terrible, if you thought TF2's community sucked, this one's even worse. They'll ban you for asking for help learning the game, they'll ban you for typing in chat, they'll ban you for attacking. Do not buy unless you plan on running your own server and learning the game alone.

Онлайн в мультиплеере 30 человек в игре 1999 года, точь в точь как Quake I 1996 года, в Quake 3 1999 года 500 серверов. Лучше поиграть в Quake 3. Единственное важное отличие это классы, которые можно написать на скриптовом языке игры, модернизируя сценарии.

Unfortunately, the game is no longer played, but if you play and then 3-5 people.A but this game about 18 years ago was very playable.

I bought this game as on sale it was just for 79p and I thought it was just something to buy, on a boring Summer's day I decided to install it and I was quite surprised by the gameplay, not the graphics as they're not very good, along with the resoluton which was limited to 1280x960 but the game played well, the story/vibe of Team Fortress was reignited in me and I enjoyed this game more than TF2 for some reasons. For example I enjoyed having a wider range of weapons as a character along with the ability to have mines/explosives of some sort. From this I saw what the early stages of Team Fortress looked like and how they went from this to TF2. This game gives me nostalgia  as I have played the games run on the same engine such as Half Life 1&2. I just enjoy this game as I enjoy revisiting different games through history that I hadn't experienced.
I quite enjoy this game, and if you enjoy games that have near to no requirements and is around 500mb to install, you will enjoy it.

[b] UPDATE [/b]
I played this game some more and I have seen that this game was at one point really active, I gained this from one source a guy on a server with over 13,000 hours which shows that this game, a few years ago must have been active, I really enjoy this game, it isn't as dull as TF2, in my opinion this game is just spectacular sure it's over 10 years old but the fact is, it is still enjoyable and the servers aren't completely dead.

I don't know if you're going to buy this thing. The core gameplay is what you'd expect in Team Fortress 2. Unlike TF2, TFC is a pretty old game that doesn't get regularly updated. As a result, TFC lacked inventory and loadaout systems (which means no special guns and NO HATS). If you enjoy a game without hats, I'd recommend this game.

This game is very outdated. Weapons are bad, some classes are much more OP than others (HWG), melees mean nothing, maps are poorly designed, reminds no one of TF2, no one plays this game, and it's not worth $5.00. This game should be free because no one deserves to have to pay money for this and maybe make TF2 worth $5.00 since it's FAR more better than this garbage. All the other reviews recommend this game because there are no micro-transactions or bad updates. However, this game has absolutely no updates (even bug fixing updates), some how community servers are worse because of all the mods installed on them, and you're stuck with the same weapons for each class. Even for TF2 fans, it's crap. Everyone who likes this game is nostalgia blind.
